title: Boston National Historical Park: In Our Back Yard
body: In Our Back Yard              Patriot of Color-Peter Salem   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:2 minutes, 56 seconds  Peter Salem was an African American who fought at the Battle of Bunker Hill      Â          Patriot of Color- Alexander Quapish   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:2 minutes, 23 seconds  Alexander Quapish was a Native American who fought at the Battle of Bunker Hill. He died shortly after the battle.
